data-types_key1: Show an example how addition of `string` and addition of numbers work.
data-types_key2: Tell them how the two addition are fundamentally really different.
data-types_key3: From here build the concept of data types and how `variables` can store different types of data to do different things.
data-types_key4: Tell them there are 2 types of data types - `strings` & numbers.
